protein.specific_function: The function of this enzyme is unclear as allantoicase activity is not known to exist in mammals.

go_class.description: hydrolase activity, acting on carbon-nitrogen (but not peptide) bonds
hydrolase activity, acting on carbon-nitrogen (but not peptide) bonds, in linear amidines

reference.reference_text: Vigetti D, Monetti C, Acquati F, Taramelli R, Bernardini G: Human allantoicase gene: cDNA cloning, genomic organization and chromosome localization. Gene. 2000 Oct 3;256(1-2):253-60.
